title: Containerization with Docker and Kubernetes
reason: This course directly addresses your interest in Kubernetes for deploying microservices by covering containerization fundamentals and orchestration.

title: APIs and Microservices Architecture
reason: This course is highly relevant as it focuses on designing and implementing microservices, which is a core part of your interest in building such systems.

title: Cloud Computing with Azure
reason: This course introduces cloud deployment with Azure, including Azure Kubernetes Service, which aligns with your interest in deploying microservices with Kubernetes.

title: MLOps: Productionizing Machine Learning
reason: While focused on ML, this course includes relevant topics like containerization and CI/CD that could be broadly applicable to deploying systems.

title: Deep Learning with TensorFlow and Keras
reason: This course is not directly aligned with your stated interests in building and deploying microservices with Kubernetes.
